text:
11 Korean cosmetics that will come in handy in winter
03 Nov 2019, 18:00 by Evgenia Sevastyanova
Gels, foams, masks, lip balms and other products that help the skin stay hydrated, radiant and supple.
General winter face, lip and eyelid tips for winter

Wash and wash your hands with warm, not hot water, so as not to dry your skin.
Replace soap with a high alkali content with mild, gentle products: foams, mousses, hydrophilic oils.
Choose products without alcohol and sulfates in the composition or with a minimum amount, so as not to severely damage the protective barrier of the skin.
Use products that contain oils, hyaluronic acid, glycerin, urea, and other components that hold Moisturizers: The Slippery Road moisture.
Do not forget about moisturizing and nourishing masks, serums and patches for the skin of the face, eyelids and lips.
Choose hygienic lipsticks with beeswax, vitamin E or oils in the composition.
It is better to refuse scrubs and other cosmetics with abrasive particles or at least reduce their use to once a week. Instead of such products, give preference to soft peeling rolls.

Face cosmetics
1. Elizavecca Moisturizing Cream Pudding



The cream contains hyaluronic acid and glycerin - substances that retain moisture in the skin. Thanks to them, you can not worry that cold and dry winter air will provoke dryness and peeling. And if they have already appeared, then regular use of the cream will eliminate these troubles.
Resilience and elasticity will give macadamia oil. Due to the content of palmitoleic acid in it - a substance present in sebum, the oil promotes * healing of cracks and is perceived by the skin as related. Therefore, the chance of an allergic reaction is minimal. * Source: Topical anti ‚Äë inflammatory activity of palmitoleic acid improves wound healing
Price: 1 080 rubles.

buy

2. Tony Moly Color Fabric Mask



The seller offers three masks to choose from: blue, pink and green. The basis of each is soft viscose. Thanks to this material, masks fit tightly to the skin, and the serum is quickly absorbed without leaving any sticky marks on the face. All masks are saturated with different vitamins and other useful substances - their purpose depends on these components.
Blue contains vitamin B8 and hyaluronic acid, so it copes well with skin hydration. Pink with vitamins B12 and B3 in the composition is designed to combat dullness. Vitamin B5 and Asian Centella isolate in a green mask are good for soothing * irritated skin. * Source: Moisturizing and Antiinflammatory Properties of Cosmetic Formulations Containing Centella asiatica Extract
Price: 360 rubles.

buy

3. Village 11 Factory Moisturizing Face Cream



A light cream with a gel texture perfectly copes with skin hydration thanks to glycerin and collagen in the composition. The second component is also responsible for the lifting effect - skin tightening. With regular use of the product, you can notice that it has become more elastic and elastic, and small wrinkles - invisible.
The cream fights age-related pigmentation and evens out the tone. It also softens and soothes the skin with a complex of plant extracts: Centella asiatica, sweet almonds, orange blossoms and others. The cream works most effectively in conjunction with other products of the series: moisturizing face serum and gel for the area around the eyes.
Price: 1,590 rubles.

buy

4. Ayoume Face Repair Oil



The product softens, moisturizes and restores skin affected by cold air. All this thanks to jojoba, sunflower and macadamia oils, extract of neem leaves and other plants.
Oil can be used in two ways. The first and obvious is to apply on the skin of the face and neck and allow to soak. The second, with a double benefit, is to add a few drops of the product to your favorite cream or foundation. In this case, cosmetics will receive additional useful properties.
Just be careful: add oil to the amount of cream that you need for one application. If you pour the contents of the entire bottle into a full tube of tonalki, it will deteriorate very quickly.
Price: 690 rubles.

buy

5. Moisturizing Peeling Roller Elizavecca



Peeling-skating roll gently exfoliates the skin, eliminates dead cells and evens out the tone. Green tea extract, a powerful natural antioxidant, is responsible for moisturizing and healing small wounds. And for softening * rough skin - allantoin. * Source: Effectiveness and Safety of an Overnight Patch Containing Allium cepa Extract and Allantoin for Post ‚Äë Dermatologic Surgery Scars
To achieve the desired effect, use a peeling roll once or twice a week. Wash your face in the usual way, dry your skin and apply, avoiding the area around the eyes and lips. Massage your face with your fingertips for a couple of minutes, then rinse with water. Done!
Price: 1 060 rubles.

buy

6. Berrisom Cleansing Foam Oil



And again, a remedy with glycerin, macadamia oil and Centella asiatica extract in the composition. In addition to the already familiar components, the foam oil is filled with other substances useful for the skin: papaya, lemon, strawberry, flax seed extract, coconut oil, lemon, grape seed and grapefruit.
All components help eliminate dryness, peeling, tightness of the skin and redness. And grapefruit, rich in organic acids, fiber and carotene, also stimulates * the production of collagen and enhances blood microcirculation. Regularly washing with foam-oil, the skin will be supple, moisturized and radiant even in severe frosts. * Source: GRAPEFRUIT BIOLOGICAL ESSENTIAL OIL
Price: 990 rubles.

buy

Lip cosmetics
1. A‚Äôpieu Honey Lip Mask



If every winter you suffer from weathered lips, feel free to try this mask. The honey extract in its composition softens the skin, promotes * tissue regeneration and maintains the necessary moisture level. * Source: Honey: A Therapeutic Agent for Disorders of the Skin
Milk proteins also fight peeling and tightness. They have a calming and antibacterial effect, keeping the skin of the lips soft and velvety. The mask does not require rinsing. It can be applied in the evening and left overnight.
Price: 400 rubles.

buy

2. Hydrogel patch for Nature Republic lips



Only 10-20 minutes of using the patch a couple of times a week - and even very weathered lips will regain their former softness, juiciness and healthy appearance. Extracts of grapefruit, palm-dissected kelp and chlorella algae have a restorative effect.
Collagen and glycerin are responsible for hydration. The latter not only retains moisture already present in the skin of the lips, but also helps the seawater in the patch to absorb better. Due to the large size, the patch cares for both the lips and the area around them.
Price: 260 rubles.

buy

3. Mizon Lip Balm with SPF10



Another magical tool that protects against the harmful effects of wind, low temperatures and even UV radiation and returns its former softness and smoothness if the lips have time to suffer. The balm is quickly absorbed, does not stick and has a subtle sweetish aroma.
The balm contains collagen, a complex of oils and plant extracts and beeswax. Together, these substances eliminate dryness and saturate delicate skin with nutrients and moisture. The manufacturer claims that positive changes will occur after a week of regular use of the balm. But customers in the reviews do not agree with this: they note that the effect is achieved on the second day!
Price: 680 rubles.

buy

Cosmetics for the skin around the eyes
1. Ottie Eye Cream



There are no sebaceous glands in the skin around the eyes, which is why this area suffers from poor climatic conditions in the first place. To maintain it in good condition, instead of the usual cream, use this product with hyaluronic acid and panthenol.
The cream will eliminate swelling, refresh and even out the color, moisturize and reduce the number of facial wrinkles. Also, the tool will cope well with the first signs of aging, dullness and wilting of the skin.
Price: 1 129 rubles.

buy

2. Ayoume Hydrogel Patches



Multifunctional patches can be used on the eyelids, between the eyebrows and on the nasolabial folds. They are made of hydrogel, so they fit tightly on the skin and do not move from movements.
Several components fight edema, dark circles, and dehydration. Collagen, glycerin and hyaluronic acid help preserve moisture in the skin, while extracts of grapefruit seeds, bamboo stems and green tea are saturated with nutrients.
Price: 699 rubles.

buy


Note! All prices are valid at the time of publication of the collection. Stores can update the value of goods throughout the day.
